    java.util.List<Ray> Camera.constructRaysForDepthOfField​(Ray ray, Point3D p1, double _apertureSize)
    construct Rays For Depth Of Field and with performance improvement(ADAPTIVE SUPERSAMPLING) The function gets a the up and right point of the square and a length of the square sizes (the length and the location of the point depend on the calcColor recursion), which creates the three others edges.

    construct Rays For Depth Of Field and with performance improvement(ADAPTIVE SUPERSAMPLING) The function gets a the up and right point of the square and a length of the square sizes (the length and the location of the point depend on the calcColor recursion), which creates the three others edges.
    Point3D Camera.findFocalPoint​(Ray ray)
    find Focal Point with ray, by using law of cosines on the triangle that the ray and vto create.
